fields.bio: Maurice is a fifth year and graduating PhD. student in the Department of Pharmacology with research focus on the physiological effects of specific dopamine receptor complex in the brain reward circuitry on addiction- and depression-related behaviours. By joining the LSCDS alumni team Maurice hopes to expand his networking and aims to eventually work in pharmaceutical companies as a Medical Science Liasion. Outside of work, Maurice is passionate about singing, including songs in Mandarin, Cantonese and English, with special interest in Rock & Roll.
